## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G20870](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G20870)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ZTP29</u>
- **Gene Name:** zinc transporter 29
- **Description:**   ZIP metal ion transporter family;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
